code: const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export async function listFiles(){const resp=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/files"));return await resp.json();}export async function uploadFile(file){const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',file);return fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/files"),{method:'POST',body:formData});}export async function deleteFiles(fileKeys){return fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/files"),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({files:fileKeys})});}
